survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the adoption and perception of sustainable practices in office environments among employees.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with your company's sustainability policies or initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure familiarity levels effectively.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with your company's sustainability policies or initiatives?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable office practices does your company currently implement? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture the breadth of practices.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainable office practices does your company currently implement? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to participate in sustainability programs if offered by your company?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring likelihood.

script.question_text: How likely are you to participate in sustainability programs if offered by your company?

questions.question_text: What barriers, if any, do you see to adopting more sustainable practices in your office?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative insights.

script.question_text: What barriers, if any, do you see to adopting more sustainable practices in your office?
